review: I recently took my Amazon Fire TV with me on vacation and it worked like a charm but with one glitch: when it asked me sign on to my cable provider for HBO and Showtime apps, my cable company was not listed, only local cable companies. And now that I'm home it still isn't listing my local cable company. Is this a Fire TV glitch? Or a cable company glitch? The HBO and Showtime Apps work fine on my Kindle Fire. Everything was working fine until I took it on vacation.
author: Margo B. Johnson
